snippet.title: Enemy Remains - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Enemy Remains is a punishing continuation to Kalaban, offering a blend of intense top-down action and survival horror. 

Play the game solo or plug in a controller to hop in as a second player in couch co-op! Monsters and fiends won't stand a chance against two players working as one. But sudden death awaits the careless and brash explorer.

ENEMY REMAINS ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1478590/Enemy_Remains/

Test out the newest versions of games. We provide the newest, fresh builds for our patrons, and invite all of our supporters to take part in game design and quality control. Join now for only ONE DOLLAR a month! https://www.patreon.com/grmgamedev
